scripts.preversion: if git diff --quiet HEAD; then echo "You have changes on your git, commit them and rerun npm version"; exit 0; fi
scripts.postversion:
sed -i -e "1s/^/## $npm_package_version
/" CHANGELOG.md; git add CHANGELOG.md; git add package.json; git commit -m $npm_package_version; git push origin master; git push origin --tags; npm run docker-publish
scripts.docker-publish: docker build -t cusspvz/btsync:$npm_package_version; docker push cusspvz/btsync:$npm_package_version
scripts.docker-publish-latest: docker build -t cusspvz/btsync:latest; docker push cusspvz/btsync:latest
